title: Add field-level ownership metadata for tags and priority changes

sections.text: Implement backend support to record and expose the current “owner” for issue tags and priority (team/user) and the last editor + timestamp. When a tag/priority update is written, persist the actor identity and source (UI/API/integration) to enable attribution and audit. This metadata will be used by subsequent tickets to enforce ownership rules and approval flows without changing behavior yet.
